attributes.action: allow patients to “top-up” their NHS care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, patients who want to pay extra towards their NHS care – for example for an extra drug or treatment – are forced to pay for the total cost of all of their care.  We believe this is illogical and immoral.  

Instead, the NHS should allow patients to pay for extras without making them pay the total cost of their care.
